Class SelectionBC


  • public class SelectionBC
implements BusinessComponent

    ChileCustomerBC.bbj

    See Also:
    []

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SelectionBC(BusinessComponent selectedBC!)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and TypeMethod and Description
      static StringFIELDNAME_SELECTION_DESC()
      static StringFIELDNAME_SELECTION_USER()
      DataRowgetAllowedFilter()

      Gets a data row of fields (the values are not used) which are allowed for filtering.
      The default implementation returns the attributes record.

      DataRowgetAttributesRecord()

      Returns an empty DataRow including all field attributes (like field name, editable, label etc.)

      IConfigurationsBCgetConfigurationsBC()
      DataRowgetFilter()
      StringgetKey()
      BusinessComponentgetLookup(String fieldName!, DataRow currentDr!)
      ResultSetgetLookupData(String fieldName!, DataRow dr!)
      DataRowgetNewObjectTemplate(DataRow predefined!)

      Gets an initialized (predefined) data row, including all data row and field attributes.
      This method can be used to set default values for a new data row. If NULL is passed, then a new (empty) data row is returned. This method sets the working data row to this one.

      voidremove(DataRow dr!)

      Remove a customer.

      ResultSetretrieve()

      Retrieves a ResultSet with customer DataRow's. If a filter is set, this will be applied to filter the result. If a scope and/or a field selection is set, it will be used to retrieve the desired fields.

      ResultSetretrieve(BBjInt first%, BBjInt last%)

      Retrieves a ResultSet with a subset of customer DataRow's. If a filter is set, this will be applied to filter the result. If a scope and/or a field selecetion are set, they will be used to retrieve the desired fields.

      voidsetFieldSelection(BBjVector fieldSelection!)

      Sets the working field selection to a custom set of fields contained in a vector.
      Field selections are in addition to any scope fields. This method sets the working result set to NULL.

      voidsetFieldSelection(DataRow fieldSelection!)

      Sets the working field selection to a custom set of fields contained in a data row.
      Field selections are in addition to any scope fields. This method sets the working result set to NULL.

      voidsetFieldSelection(Collection fieldSelection!)

      Sets the working field selection to a custom set of fields contained in a collection object.
      Field selections are in addition to any scope fields. This method sets the working result set to NULL.

      voidsetFilter(DataRow filter!)

      Set a filter to filter the search result. The filter is used in the retrieve method. If no filter is set, the retrieve method will return all customers.

      voidsetKey(String key!)
      voidsetScope(BBjString scope$)

      Set a field selection scope (A, B or D). If no or a wrong scope is set then the default scope (D) will be used.

      ResultSetvalidateRemove(DataRow dr!)

      Validates a customer DataRow object before it can be removed. This method is internally used by the remove method. But it can also be called from the frontend to check for dependencies before it can be removed.

      ResultSetvalidateWrite(DataRow dr!)

      Validates a customer DataRow object before it can be written. This method is internally used by the write method. But it can also be called from the frontend to check for required or missing data.

      DataRowwrite(DataRow dr!)

      Write/persist a customer.

      • FIELDNAME_SELECTION_DESC

        public static String FIELDNAME_SELECTION_DESC()

      • FIELDNAME_SELECTION_USER

        public static String FIELDNAME_SELECTION_USER()

      • getAllowedFilter

        public DataRow getAllowedFilter()

        Gets a data row of fields (the values are not used) which are allowed for filtering.
        The default implementation returns the attributes record.

        Returns:
        the data row with fields allowed for filtering
        See Also:
        #getAttributesRecord()

      • getAttributesRecord

        public DataRow getAttributesRecord()

        Returns an empty DataRow including all field attributes (like field name, editable, label etc.)

        Returns:
        the empty DataRow with the field attributes

      • getConfigurationsBC

        public IConfigurationsBC getConfigurationsBC()

      • getFilter

        public DataRow getFilter()

      • getKey

        public String getKey()

      • getLookup

        public BusinessComponent getLookup(String fieldName!, DataRow currentDr!)

      • getLookupData

        public ResultSet getLookupData(String fieldName!, DataRow dr!)

      • getNewObjectTemplate

        public DataRow getNewObjectTemplate(DataRow predefined!)

        Gets an initialized (predefined) data row, including all data row and field attributes.
        This method can be used to set default values for a new data row. If NULL is passed, then a new (empty) data row is returned. This method sets the working data row to this one.

        Parameters:
        predefined! the data row with predefined fields and attributes
        Returns:
        the initialized data row

      • remove

        public void remove(DataRow dr!)

        Remove a customer.

        Parameters:
        DataRow dr! a customer DataRow to be removed.
        Throws:
        an exception if the customer does not exists.
        See Also:
        #validateRemove(DataRow dr!)

      • retrieve

        public ResultSet retrieve()

        Retrieves a ResultSet with customer DataRow's. If a filter is set, this will be applied to filter the result. If a scope and/or a field selection is set, it will be used to retrieve the desired fields.

        Returns:
        ResultSet a ResultSet with customer DataRows (may be empty).

      • retrieve

        public ResultSet retrieve(BBjInt first%, BBjInt last%)

        Retrieves a ResultSet with a subset of customer DataRow's. If a filter is set, this will be applied to filter the result. If a scope and/or a field selecetion are set, they will be used to retrieve the desired fields.

        Parameters:
        BBjInt first% the index of the first element in the subset (1 based)
        BBjInt last% the index of the last element in the subset.
        Returns:
        ResultSet a ResultSet with customer DataRows (may be empty).

      • setFieldSelection

        public void setFieldSelection(BBjVector fieldSelection!)

        Sets the working field selection to a custom set of fields contained in a vector.
        Field selections are in addition to any scope fields. This method sets the working result set to NULL.

        Parameters:
        BBjVector fieldSelection! a vector containing the field names

      • setFieldSelection

        public void setFieldSelection(DataRow fieldSelection!)

        Sets the working field selection to a custom set of fields contained in a data row.
        Field selections are in addition to any scope fields. This method sets the working result set to NULL.

        Parameters:
        fieldSelection! a data row containing the field names (only the field names are used)
        See Also:
        #retrieve()

      • setFieldSelection

        public void setFieldSelection(Collection fieldSelection!)

        Sets the working field selection to a custom set of fields contained in a collection object.
        Field selections are in addition to any scope fields. This method sets the working result set to NULL.

        Parameters:
        fieldSelection! a string collection containing the field names
        See Also:
        #retrieve()

      • setFilter

        public void setFilter(DataRow filter!)

        Set a filter to filter the search result. The filter is used in the retrieve method. If no filter is set, the retrieve method will return all customers.

        Parameters:
        DataRow filter! a DataRow object including field names and values to filter for. Filters are AND combined.
        See Also:
        #retrieve()

      • setKey

        public void setKey(String key!)

      • setScope

        public void setScope(BBjString scope$)

        Set a field selection scope (A, B or D). If no or a wrong scope is set then the default scope (D) will be used.

        Parameters:
        BBjString scope$ the scope to set.

      • validateRemove

        public ResultSet validateRemove(DataRow dr!)

        Validates a customer DataRow object before it can be removed. This method is internally used by the remove method. But it can also be called from the frontend to check for dependencies before it can be removed.

        Parameters:
        DataRow dr! a customer DataRow that should be removed
        Returns:
        BBjVector List with validation error messages (empty list means no validation errors).

      • validateWrite

        public ResultSet validateWrite(DataRow dr!)

        Validates a customer DataRow object before it can be written. This method is internally used by the write method. But it can also be called from the frontend to check for required or missing data.

        Parameters:
        DataRow dr! a customer DataRow that will be validated
        Returns:
        BBjVector List with validation error messages (empty list means no validation errors).

      • write

        public DataRow write(DataRow dr!)

        Write/persist a customer.

        Parameters:
        DataRow dr! a customer DataRow to be persist.
        Returns:
        DataRow the customer DataRow (may contain auto generated values/ID's)
        See Also:
        #validateWrite(DataRow dr!)
